entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
